children.name: HTML
children.description: Custom HTML.

properties.html: <style>.minHeight40{min-height: 40px} vform-context-label{padding:10px 0}.target-volume,.target-volume div.repeater-table-div{width:100%!important}.target-volume div.repeater-table-div > vform-dynamic{width:calc(50% - 20px)!important}.bodybold {font-weight: bold} .place-template .mat-select-underline{ height:0;} .fontbold{font-weight:bold;} .padding-right-20px{padding-right:20px;} .inline-group vform-context-label{padding-right: 5px;}</style>
